      • validMoveCount

        public int validMoveCount()
        This move checks the squares surrounding the king and counts the number of valid moves for him.
        Returns:
        result number of valid moves for the king. Max return value is 9

      • checkThreats

        public boolean checkThreats(int r,
                            int c)
        Checks if the intended position is safe for the king by checking if any pieces will place it in check. The loops in this method will all complete or break if there are no threats. Can detect out of bounds.
        Parameters:
        r - row of intended destination square for the king
        c - col of intended destination square for the king
        Returns:
        true or false/ depending on whether or not the new position will put the king in check

      • checkThreats

        public boolean checkThreats()
        Based on the king's current position, it checks if any pieces are placing it in check The loops in this method will all complete or break if there are no threats.
        Returns:
        true or false/ depending on whether or not the king is in check

      • move

        public boolean move(int row,
                    int col)
        Moves the king to destination spot if it is valid.
        Specified by:
        move in class Piece
        Parameters:
        row - row of destination square
        col - column of destination square
        Returns:
        true/false depending on whether or not the move is valid
